/* CodeRepository.ListCode */
WITH RECURSIVE R AS ( SELECT CD.CODE_ID, CD.UP_CODE_ID, CD.CODE_VALUE, CD.CODE_NAME, CD.CODE_CONTENT, CD.CODE_ORDER, CAST(CD.CODE_ORDER AS CHAR(200)) AS SORT_ORDER, CD.CODE_DEPTH, CD.USE_YN, CD.DELETE_YN FROM CO_CODE CD WHERE CD.UP_CODE_ID IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT CD.CODE_ID, CD.UP_CODE_ID, CD.CODE_VALUE, CD.CODE_NAME, CD.CODE_CONTENT, CD.CODE_ORDER, CONCAT(R.SORT_ORDER, '-', LPAD(CD.CODE_ORDER, 5, '0')) AS SORT_ORDER, CD.CODE_DEPTH, CD.USE_YN, CD.DELETE_YN FROM CO_CODE CD INNER JOIN R ON CD.UP_CODE_ID = R.CODE_ID ) SELECT R.CODE_ID, R.UP_CODE_ID, R.CODE_VALUE, R.CODE_NAME, R.CODE_CONTENT, R.CODE_ORDER, R.CODE_DEPTH, R.USE_YN, R.DELETE_YN FROM R WHERE R.DELETE_YN = 'N' ORDER BY CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(R.SORT_ORDER, '-', 1) AS UNSIGNED), CASE WHEN R.SORT_ORDER LIKE '%-%' THEN CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(R.SORT_ORDER, '-', -1) AS UNSIGNED) ELSE 0 END

/* CodeRepository.GetCode */
SELECT CD.CODE_ID, CD.UP_CODE_ID, CD.CODE_VALUE, CD.CODE_NAME, CD.CODE_CONTENT, CD.CODE_ORDER, CD.CODE_DEPTH, CD.USE_YN, CD.DELETE_YN FROM CO_CODE CD WHERE CD.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND CD.CODE_ID = @CodeId

/* CodeRepository.UpdateCode */
UPDATE CO_CODE SET CODE_ID = @CodeId, UP_CODE_ID = @UpCodeId, CODE_VALUE = @CodeValue, CODE_NAME = @CodeName, CODE_CONTENT = @CodeContent, CODE_ORDER = @CodeOrder, CODE_DEPTH = @CodeDepth, USE_YN = @UseYn, UPDATER_ID = @UpdaterId, UPDATE_DT = SYSDATE() WHERE CODE_ID = @OriginalCodeId

/* CodeRepository.RemoveCode */
UPDATE CO_CODE SET DELETE_YN = 'Y', UPDATER_ID = @UpdaterId, UPDATE_DT = SYSDATE() WHERE CODE_ID = @CodeId
